  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable

    public class OrganSurgeon
extends Surgeon
    Organ Surgeon inherits from Surgeon with the ability to cure specific organ related illnesses.
    Author:
    Man-Leong Chan

      • tryAssignPatient

        public boolean tryAssignPatient(Patient patient)
        Try to assign patient to a specific surgeon.

        It checks whether the surgeon has the specialism required.

        Overrides:
        tryAssignPatient in class Surgeon
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • treatPatient

        public void treatPatient()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Treat the patient.

        First check if the organ surgeon is assigned with a patient, else it assumes that the surgeon has treat a patient.

        Overrides:
        treatPatient in class Surgeon
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the Organ surgeon can't treat the illness.
